game.name: Madrobot X
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: MadRobot X is an old school shoot 'em up game. You control a robot trying to escape from the laboratory of a mad scientist, and to accomplish this, you'll need the help of GoboGobo, another robot who also wants to escape.
